title: Mel B brings pet dog Cookie on luxurious Caribbean family holiday
text:
Too blessed to be stressed (Picture: Rex/Instagram/officialmelb)

Mel B has bought her dog Cookie with her on a family holiday to the Caribbean island of Nevis because, you know, she deserves a holiday too.

The former Spice Girls singer shared a snap of herself at the shore while holding the tiny dog above her.

She captioned the post: ‘Cookie is taking in the beautiful island of Nevis’.

Scary Spice uploaded another picture of Cookie on the beach with her adorable paw prints dotted all around her.

This dog is luckier than all of us.

The 44-year-old and her sister Danielle Brown have been visiting their late father’s hometown, enjoying ‘good food, drink and a whole load of very loud reggae music’ with their family.

Mel and Danielle, 38, posed for a bikini picture on a boat during their trip in which Danielle opened up about her body post-pregnancy.

Lucky Cookie went on holiday with Mel (Picture: @officialmelb)

Mel B and her sister took a much-needed break with sister Danielle (Picture: Instagram/missdaniellebrown)

Cookie’s jamming to Reggae and munching on kibble (Picture: Mel B/Instagram)

Danielle wrote: ‘This is me and my beautiful sister, this is us!! No filters, this is real life, my body might not be perfect To you, I have ripples lumps bumps that I never knew could exist but I also have 3 beautiful children and I cant be arsed to do some strict diet to loose my baby weight and feel bloody miserable.

‘Being in my dads hometown Nevis everything is very one with nature, real life you only need good food, drink and whole load of very loud reggae music and your happy.

‘I am embracing my roots and trying to ride the wave of this thing we call grief, very happy to be in Nevis with my one and only sister @officialmelb live your life people and make the most of it, be kind to yourself [sic].’

The two have been paying their respects after their great-grandmother died aged 107, and have been honouring their late father Martin Brown’s memory at the same time.

Mel also bought her kids Pheonix Chi, 20, from her relationship with Jimmy Gulzar, Angel, 12, whose dad is Eddie Murphy, and Madison, eight, from her relationship with ex-husband Stephen Belafonte.
